item.mca.scythe.tooltip: Bunuh seorang penduduk desa dan ambil jiwanya, lalu klik-kanan suatu batu nisan untuk hidupkannya kembali. Tapi hati-hati, penduduk desa yang sudah mati akan bangkit sebagai mayat hidup.
item.mca.wedding_ring.tooltip: Nikahi seseorang jika Anda memenuhi persyaratan hati
item.mca.wedding_ring_rg.tooltip: Nikahi seseorang jika Anda memenuhi persyaratan hati
item.mca.engagement_ring.tooltip: Bertunanganlah dengan seseorang yang punya jumlah hati cukup
item.mca.engagement_ring_rg.tooltip: Bertunanganlah dengan seseorang yang punya jumlah hati cukup
item.mca.comb.tooltip: Klik kanan untuk mengganti gaya rambutmu.
item.mca.bouquet.tooltip: Hadiah yang bagus untuk memulai hubungan.
item.mca.baby.name: Nama: %s
item.mca.baby.no_drop/1: Kamu tidak bisa menjatuhkan bayi, monster
item.mca.divorce_papers.tooltip: Berikan ini kepada pasanganmu untuk mengakhiri pernikahan (tidak) bahagia
item.mca.villager_editor.tooltip:
Memodifikasi atribut villager

Jongkok sambil menggunakan untuk membuka inventaris penduduk desa
item.mca.whistle.tooltip: Klik-kanan untuk memanggil keluarga kamu ke lokasimu saat ini
item.mca.family_tree.tooltip: Buku tebal ini berisi pohon keluarga setiap penduduk desa yang pernah hidup.
item.mca.villager_tracker.tooltip: Powered by the same magic as ender eyes, this tracker can track most villagers. Assuming you remember their name.
item.mca.civil_registry.tooltip: Literate villagers keep track of all kind of events in this kind of books.
item.mca.staff_of_life.tooltip: Klik-kanan sebuah batu nisan untuk menghidupkan kembali orang desa yang telah meninggal
item.mca.blueprint.tooltip: Klik-kanan untuk mengelola desa yang kamu berada saat ini
item.mca.potion_of_feminity.tooltip: Right-click to make yourself or a villager feminine.
item.mca.potion_of_masculinity.tooltip: Right-click to make yourself or a villager masculine.
analysis.title: Analisis interaksi terakhir:
personalityDescription.strong: Memberikan damage yang jauh lebih besar
personalityDescription.sensitive: Double heart penalty on failed interactions
personalityDescription.odd: Less success chance when entering personal space
personalityDescription.lazy: Slow. Always. And likes to eat.
traits.title: Sifat:
traitDescription.sirben: Was unfortunately born as a Sirben. Nothing one can do about this.
traitDescription.bisexual: Dapat memiliki ketertarikan pada jenis kelamin apa pun.
traitDescription.homosexual: Dapat memiliki ketertarikan pada jenis kelamin yang sama.
traitDescription.left_handed: Menggunakan tangan kiri sebagai tangan dominan.
traitDescription.tough: Tough as nails, and deals quite some blows.
traitDescription.unknown: Once this villager had a trait, but is now lost to time.
buildingType.big_house.description: Families love to live in the same house, but that requires a few extra beds.
buildingType.blacksmith.description: A place to produce the highest quality equipment for the guards and archers.
buildingType.graveyard.description: Satu atau lebih batu nisan. Jiwa-jiwa penduduk desa yang gugur membutuhkan batu nisan yang kosong untuk dapat beristirahat.
buildingType.library.description: Tempat yang tenang untuk pustakawan, ulama, dan kartografer. Dengan meningkatkan logistik desa, pajak meningkat 50%!
buildingType.inn.description: Penduduk desa yang sedih meminum kesedihan mereka di sini dan penginapan ini juga menarik semua jenis pelancong.
buildingType.prison.description: Tempat untuk mengunci pencuri, pengkhianat, dan sejenisnya.
buildingType.infirmary.description: Mengurangi kemungkinan infeksi hingga 50%! Penduduk desa yang sakit cenderung berkumpul di sini.
gui.skin_library.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this content?
gui.skin_library.report_confirm: Why do you want to report this content?
gui.skin_library.report_invalid_tooltip: This is not pure hair/clothing and thus does not work correctly. It should get labeled as 'invalid'.
gui.skin_library.report_default_tooltip: This content is against the rules as specified at the help page.
gui.skin_library.drop: Drop an image here, enter a file path or URL to start.
gui.skin_library.locked: To publish skins, please log in first.
gui.skin_library.like_locked: Please log in to see liked or submitted content.
gui.skin_library.add.tooltip: Tagging content helps user find and filter for specific assets.
gui.skin_library.name: Name
gui.skin_library.read_the_help: This skin appears to be invalid!
gui.skin_library.read_the_help_hair: This hair might be too dark or not grayscale!
gui.skin_library.meta.chance.tooltip: Probability that this asset is used by villagers.
gui.skin_library.prepare: What asset type do you want to create?
gui.skin_library.fillToolThreshold.toolt: Pressing F fill delete similar, adjacent pixels up to the given threshold.
gui.skin_library.tool_help:
Controls:
Left mouse to paint
Right mouse to delete
Middle mouse to pick color
Hold space or mouse 3 to pan
Mousewheel to zoom
F to clear similar pixels
Click to open help
gui.skin_library.help: Click to open help. MCA Skins need a bit of preprocessing in order to look good.
gui.skin_library.temperature.tooltip: Temperature decides the biomes this asset is used in by villagers.
gui.skin_library.element.head: Head
gui.destiny.journey: Di mana perjalanan Anda akan dimulai?
destiny.story.reason/1: Suatu hari, Anda merasa cukup dan memutuskan untuk melakukan perjalanan menjelajahi dunia.
destiny.story.travelling/1: Anda menaklukkan pegunungan bersalju dan rawa-rawa yang lembab, Menghindari Husk di gurun yang tak berujung.
destiny.story.somewhere/1: Anda terdampar tanpa makanan dan tempat berlindung di antah berantah.
destiny.story.sailing/1: Anda menghabiskan beberapa Emerald yang telah Anda simpan untuk menaiki sebuah kapal kecil. Tetapi badai memutuskan nasib kapal dan awaknya, menghancurkan dan mencabik-cabiknya.
destiny.story.shipwreck_beached/1: Anda terbangun di puing-puing kapal yang terdampar, jauh dari apa pun yang Anda ketahui, para kru kapal mati atau hilang.
destiny.story.village_desert/1: Suatu hari, Anda menemukan sebuah desa kecil di tengah gurun. Airnya langka dan matahari, menyilaukan mata Anda, tetapi penduduk desa tampak puas dengan kehidupan mereka
destiny.story.village_taiga/1: While trying to get out of a large taiga, you stumbled across a hidden village. The people seem nice, maybe you can find a new home here.
destiny.story.village_snowy/1: You fight your way through a heavy snowstorm when you see dim lights up ahead. It is a village, maybe they have an inn to warm up?
destiny.story.village_plains/1: In the middle of a plains biome, a few villagers built themselves a settlement. The climate is moderate, the people friendly, perhaps they have place for another settler?
destiny.story.village_savanna/1: Finally you find a village between dry trees and grass. Let's see if they are friendly!
destiny.story.ancient_city/1: But an unfortunate misstep sends you tumbling into a deep, dark cave. When you regain consciousness, you find yourself surrounded by the ancient ruins of a city forgotten by the world for eons.
gui.blueprint.rankTooLow: Anda memerlukan peringkat yang lebih tinggi.
gui.blueprint.addBuilding.tooltip: Adds all connected rooms as building.
gui.blueprint.addRoom.tooltip: Adds a single room with roof and door as a building.
gui.blueprint.buildingTypes: Select a building to see its requirements. Once you built something, enter it and hit "Add Building" from the map page.
gui.blueprint.empty: There is no village! Add the first building to start a new village!
gui.blueprint.catalogHint: Build special buildings by fulfilling those conditions!
gui.blueprint.autoScanDisabled: Enable auto-scan (under advanced) or add buildings manually!
gui.blueprint.tooltip.taxes: Tax your villagers! The higher percentage, the more they will deliver into the storage at the cost of reputation.
gui.blueprint.tooltip.births: Control the percentage of occupied beds, 0% prevents births completely.
gui.blueprint.tooltip.marriage: Control the percentage of married people, 0% prevents marriages completely.
gui.nameBaby.title: Name Baby
gui.whistle.title: Peluit
gui.whistle.noFamily: No family members could be found in the area.
gui.village.taxes.no: %s is happy not to pay taxes.
gui.village.taxes.more: %s is glad to live in wealth thanks to the low taxes and paid an extra 25%%.
gui.village.taxes.happy: %s is happy to have such fair taxes.
gui.village.taxes.sad: %s got sad, the taxes are too much for them.
gui.village.taxes.angry: %s got angry due to the high taxes.
gui.village.taxes.riot: %s refused to pay those high taxes this time.
gui.label: Name:
gui.interact.label.giveGift: Select an item and press the right mouse button.
gui.family_tree.title: Family Tree
gui.villager_editor.title: Editor Orang Desa
gui.villager_editor.name_created: Name '%1$s' is unknown, an entry has been created.
gui.villager_editor.name_unique: Name '%1$s' is unique and has been assigned.
gui.villager_editor.name_not_unique: Name '%1$s' is not unique, consider using the UUID instead.
gui.villager_editor.page.head: Head
gui.villager_editor.player_skin.tooltip: Use the vanilla skin, but apply genetics where possible
gui.villager_editor.vanilla_skin.tooltip: Use the vanilla player model and use this customization only for inheritance
gui.villager_editor.customization_hint: Use the comb, needle and thread and the potion of metamorphosis to customize.
gui.villager_editor.model_blacklist_hint: An installed mod is incompatible with MCAs custom player models.
gui.villager_editor.hair_mode.tooltip: Toggles HSV dyed hair. Only the underlying genetic hair color is inherited.
command.verify.failed: Whoops, the given email is wrong.
command.no_permission: This command is disabled for users.
command.tts_busy: (Whenever villagers remain silent, it means the text-to-speech has to generate that phrase first. It will be there next time.)
command.tts_unsupported_language: Your game language is not supported by the text-to-speech. Please change it to English or disable TTS.
blueprint.noBuilding: You need to stand within a building
blueprint.scan.no_door: Building requires at least one door!
blueprint.scan.invalid_type: Building cannot be set to the requested type!
reaper.totems: Three obsidian pillars, lit with fire, are required.
server.sentProposal: You have already sent a proposal to %1$s.
server.spouseNotPresent: Your spouse is not present on the server.
server.procreationRequest: %1$s has requested procreation. To accept, type /mca procreate within 10 seconds.
server.marriedToVillager: You cannot use this command when married to a villager.
server.babyPresent: You already have a baby with this partner.
server.notMarried: You cannot procreate if you are not married.
server.alreadyMarried: You cannot send a proposal since you are already married.
server.proposalSent: Your proposal to %1$s has been sent!
server.proposedMarriage: %1$s has proposed marriage. To accept, type /mca accept %1$s!
server.marriageEnded: %1$s has ended their marriage with you.
server.playerNotCustomized.title: Customize your player!
server.destinyNotSet.title: Set your destiny!
server.mail.title: You have mail!
events.bountyHuntersFinal: %1$s has been wiped out, a large group of bounty hunters try to avenge it!
advancement.mca.family.description: Start a family with a villager
advancement.mca.grandparent.description: Father at least two generations of off-spring
advancement.mca.grow_child.description: Your baby has become a child!
advancement.mca.marriage.description: Get engaged and marry a villager
advancement.mca.monster.description: You dropped the baby... You monster.
advancement.mca.root.description: Enter a village. Your new social journey awaits!
advancement.mca.twins.description: Have two babies for the price of one!
advancement.mca.scythe_kill.description: Kill a villager with the scythe
advancement.mca.scythe_revive.descriptio: Use a charged scythe to revive a villager
advancement.mca.staff_of_life.descriptio: Use the staff of life to revive a fallen comrade
advancement.mca.merchant.description: Get your first rank in a village.
advancement.mca.chores.description: Let your children do the work.
advancement.mca.baby_smelted.description: Abort a baby by unconventional means.
advancement.mca.baby_sirben_smelted: Truth, Justice, and the pursuit of destruction!
advancement.mca.baby_sirben_smelted.desc: Go out of your way to eliminate those cultists (even if by unethical methods)!
advancement.mca.baby_dropped: A not so accidental rain check...
advancement.mca.baby_dropped.description: As a monarch, go out of your way to willingly terminate one of your own subjects.
advancement.mca.friendly_fire.descriptio: Off to the brig with that one!
advancement.mca.ancient_cultists.descrip: Explore the lore of the Sirbens and disturb the slumber of the ancient cultists.
advancement.mca.williams_fate.descriptio: One of your subjects faced off against William in the den of war...
notify.spouseendedmarriage: %1$s has ended their marriage with you.
notify.revival.disabled: Revivals have been disabled by the server administrator.
notify.trading.disabled: Trading is disabled by the server administrator.
notify.playerMarriage.disabled: Pernikahan antara pemain dinonaktifkan oleh administrator server.
civil_registry.bounty_hunters: Bounty hunter has been sent after %s.
mca.ai_broken: AI broke, please send latest.log to dev!
mca.ai_help: AI enabled and reset to default. Click here to open the help page!
mca.limit.patreon: You reached your hourly AI limit. Click here to open the tutorial on how to increase that limit!
mca.limit.premium: You reached your hourly AI limit, even with your patreon subscription enabled! Please take a break.
